agents.flight.FlightPlanUpdater¶

class agents.flight.FlightPlanUpdater(agent)¶

Bases: Role

FPU: Flight Plan Updater

Description: When the flight plan is changed the information is updated for the flight. 1. Wait for request of update flight plan 2. Update information on flight plan including when to report 3. If the flight is airborne then request a flight parameters recomputation

__init__(agent)¶

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

Methods

__init__(agent)

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

assing_FP_no_compute(FP)

Just assign a FP to the flight.

send(msg)

Function to send messages to its own agent

update_FP_information(FP)

Update FP of a flight.

update_eobt(eobt, push_back_ready_event)

Update the EOBT and save the pusbh_back_ready_event to wait for it to be triggered Input: eobt: EOBT of the flight push_bac_ready_event: Event of push_back so that flight can wait for it by the DSR role in the check_push_back_ready

update_speed(perc_selected[, change_tod_dci])

Update the flight plan modifying the speed by a given percentage Input: perc_selected: Percentage of speed to use between MRC and MMO change_tod_dci: Update the descent assuming that it's modified due to change of whole trajectory with DCI, i.e., the descent would be 'steeper' and the cruise a bit longer.

wait_for_FP_assigment_no_compute(msg)

Wait for a message to assign a FP without computing

wait_for_FP_update(msg)

Wait for an update of FP (in general, i.e., to be executed)

wait_for_eobt_update(msg)

Wait for an update on the EOBT

wait_for_speed_update(msg)

Wait for an update on the cruise speed with percentage of speed selected and if TOD is to be changed considering DCI.
assing_FP_no_compute(FP)¶

Just assign a FP to the flight. Note that the ‘execution’ of the flight plan information is saved within the FP. So this assigment would only have the FP overriding any computation stored on it. This needed so that if for example flight is cancel, the flight has info of the last flight plan

send(msg)¶

Function to send messages to its own agent

update_FP_information(FP)¶

Update FP of a flight. But in this case compute the DCI extension if not provided.

update_eobt(eobt, push_back_ready_event)¶

Update the EOBT and save the pusbh_back_ready_event to wait for it to be triggered Input: eobt: EOBT of the flight push_bac_ready_event: Event of push_back so that flight can wait for it by the DSR role in the check_push_back_ready

update_speed(perc_selected, change_tod_dci=True)¶

Update the flight plan modifying the speed by a given percentage Input: perc_selected: Percentage of speed to use between MRC and MMO change_tod_dci: Update the descent assuming that it’s modified due to change of whole trajectory with DCI,

i.e., the descent would be ‘steeper’ and the cruise a bit longer.

wait_for_FP_assigment_no_compute(msg)¶

Wait for a message to assign a FP without computing

wait_for_FP_update(msg)¶

Wait for an update of FP (in general, i.e., to be executed)

wait_for_eobt_update(msg)¶

Wait for an update on the EOBT

wait_for_speed_update(msg)¶

Wait for an update on the cruise speed with percentage of speed selected and if TOD is to be changed considering DCI.
